ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: 88.40: Egypt, Red Sea, Sharm el Nâga, 33 km S of Hurghada; 26°54'N 33°58'E; sheltered bay with sandy beach and large coralreefs, with stony reefflat; hand collected; 28/31.viii.1988
88.23: Egypt, Red Sea, S of Rimathi Island ( 4 sea-miles SSE of Hurghada); coral reef; snorkeling at 3 m; 04.v.1988
